title: Riot Fix the minions Movespeeds etc etc.
body: So I'm not sure that this is happening during ranked games but normals is a problem. You may have seen Siv HD video about when he was in a bush with LB that is one problem, the other is their movespeed. when they are moving in a long distance let say from the first tower to the second enemy tower they will gain a burst of  movespeed and sometimes teleport  by around 100 units ahead of them and even teleport in my base when I was trying to Q with Jax to a super minion that was totally in my range.

replies.body: Omg I though it was just me experiencing packet loss haha
yep its kinda funny wen that 1 minion teleports to lane before the rest
